text: Ara amara uttaradhikara diyechilama se'i lokadera yadera durbala ganya kara hayechila, -- desera purbbancalasamuha o tara pascimancala samuha -- yate amara samrd'dhi arpana karechilama. Ara tomara prabhura manorama bani paripurna hayechila isara'ilera bansadharadera ksetre yehetu tara dhairya dharechila. Ara amara bhenge phelechilama phira'a'una o tara lokera ya gare chila, ara ye- saba tara baniyechila.
